body_html:
I double checked the implementation of #1408.
The main difference is that my algorithm does not use the weight_decay while the implementation of #1408 uses the weight_decay.
According to the reports "Incorporating Nesterov Momentum into Adam" and the Keras, I believe that the weight_decay should not be used here.
Furthermore, I include the weight_decay in the paramaters of NAdam for compatibility and future use.

body:
I double checked the implementation of #1408. 
The main difference is that my algorithm does not use the weight_decay while the implementation of #1408 uses the weight_decay. 
According to the reports "Incorporating Nesterov Momentum into Adam" and the Keras, I believe that the weight_decay should not be used here. 
Furthermore, I include the weight_decay in the paramaters of NAdam  for compatibility and future use.
